name: Blame
info: 'Blame' is a project that was done in 2 weeks with a group of 4 people using C's CSFML Library, the project consisted in making a fully-featured RPG game.

name: PortalPaint
info: 'PortalPaint' is a project that was done in 2 weeks with a group of 2 people using C's CSFML Library, the project consisted in making a drawing software.

name: GoyaveSH
info: 'GoyaveSH' is a project that was done in 4 weeks with a group of 5 people using the C programming language, the project consisted in making a fully-featured terminal shell.

name: In June
info: 'In june' is a boxing game on roblox, the game goes over all aspects of Lua and LuaU (Roblox's variant of Lua), the game has; modular skins, a combat system, matchmaking, a global leaderboard and much more

name: Have a block
info: 'Have a block' is a pet simulator type of roblox game that was done in order to experiment making inventories, handling randomness (RNG), and making shop systems.

name: Find the code
info: 'find the code' is a self explanatory name, the goal in this game is to find the code and get to the next room, this is one of my older projects: it has a simple travel menu, door animations, and keypads.

name: Mosasite
info: 'Mosasite' is the site you're currently on, or is it? There were plenty of other 'Mosasites' I made that were also hosted here before and these little personal projects (on top of my professional work) truly forged my current expertise in Front-End technologies.
